name: Social Media Social Share Icon
author: SuperHero Plugins

sections.description:
Keeping Social Media Sharing Simple with Innovative & Unique Social Styles with Animations for the Most Used Social Media Networks.
Take Social Media Sharing to the Next Level with Social Share Icons,
a Freemium WordPerss Plugin with Style.
Social Media is the lifeblood that keeps the internet glowing, and Social Sharing lets you harness that activity and use it as a positive force for your business.

CHOOSE FROM THE MOST USED SOCIAL MEDIA NETWORKS
Providing you the top 5 and most used social media networks in the world to share your content uniquely with style, select any social network from the list for your readers to share your content

Social Share Icons with 15 Deifferent Designs
Social Share Icons provides uniquely identified social media sharing icon’s themes with seperate animation for every theme to select from for sharing your content

DISPLAY YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA BUTTONS WITH CLEAN DESIGNED ICONS
We know that showing your social icon buttons means something to you, that’s why we provide social icon themes for you to select from to share your content with style

WYSIWYG
What You See Is What You Get, We don’t want you to hassel much, you’ll get what you see on the front end on your WordPress site, providing you the live preview while you setting your social icons

Get Live Preview In Your Social Settings Page While You Set Things Up

You don’t need to go back and forth to see your social icons on Pages, Posts or on Home page like how they look, Live Preview is provided to show you how your social icons will look on selected pages

Sharing is Caring

We know you write compelling content for your readers & you want your content be shared over the most used social media networks, here is something you need to motivate you redaders to spread the word to other people which helps you get more readers

Motivate Your Social Media Readers
Default Message Option gave you capability to show a tagline above your social icons to motivate your readers to share your content, there are 7 Sharing Messages for you to select from

Add Social Media Share Icons in Different Locations
We know every website have different needs according to their functionality and design, Social Share Icons can detect from where your content starts and where it ends, weather it’s a Page, Post or Home page of your WordPress site, Social Share Icons place Social buttons automatically just select the option from settings page

AWESOME FEATURES
Social Media Icon Themes with Animations Adds fun while Sharing Content for the most used Social Media Networks

LIVE PREVIEW
WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) helps you to see right away on settings page

Fully Responsive and Easy to Use

Social Media Share Icons are fully responsive and look nice on different devices and themes. With simple configuration of our plugin you donâ€™t need any programming skills to create your own design of share buttons – you can easily set the animated theme, position of the buttons.

Over 15 Social Media Icons Themes

Social Media Share plugin supports many different popular social media networks – LinkdIn, Twitter, Google+, Pinterest, Facebook share Icons ! You can add any numbers of social networks and create excellent sharing toolbar, which help your visitors to choose the most suitable network for them.

Which Social Media Icons to Show

Plugin allows you to choose the various options which social media icons to show for share. Besides you can specify pages or posts where you want to show share buttons – everywhere or just on pages or posts. Social Share Icons gets users sharing the right content Ð°t the right moments, and keeps them engaged on your website.

Pre-built Design and Amazing Effects

Social Media Share Icons offers you wonderful collection of prebuilt design options and different animation effects for each design. Just select social icons and select a theme.

PREMIUM QUALITY

Precisely designed providing positions and alignments of social icons to display on your content

EASY TO CUSTOMIZE SOCIAL MEDIA SHARE ICONS

Select any social media network from the most used social networks to share content

POSITIONS & ALIGNMENTS of SOCIAL SHARE ICONS

Place social media sharing buttons either above the content area, below the content area, or in both locations left, center or right

10+ SOCIAL LAYOUTS

Prividing more than 10 social media icon themes to choose from to make it more customizable

USER FRIENDLY

Social Media Share plugins is very easy and fast, just some click away and Social Icons will appear on your WordPress site

EASY TO USE

It’s surprisingly easy to use plugin and setting it up

24/7 SUPPORT For Social Media Share Icons

Still ran into some problem? don’t hesitate to contact anytime

AMAZING TEMPLATE DESIGNS WITH SUPER COOL SOCIAL SHARE ANIMATIONS

Social Icon Themes with Animations Adds fun while Sharing Content for the most used Social Networks, with Custom sharing message you can tell user to share your content

* Over 15 Social Skins
* Fully Responsive
* Add social media share icons on Posts
* Add social media share icons on Pages
* Add social media share icons on Home screen
* Professional Skins of the social media share icons
* Simple social share icon configuration and design
* Different social media share buttons placement option

Increase Numbers of Social Media Sharing

With our Social Share Icons you will increase your social popularity and will take social sharing on a next level. It will contribute of increase the social activity on your site. Social Share Icon is an easy and fast way to let your visitors share your content to social networks, helping you in growth of your social traffic on your website.

Fully Responsive and Easy to Use

Social Share Icons are fully responsive and look nice on different devices and themes. With simple configuration of our plugin you donâ€™t need any programming skills to create your own design of share buttons – you can easily set the animated skin , position of the icons .

Over 15+ Social Media Sharing Skins

Social media share plugin supports Five most popular social networks – LinkedIn, Twitter, Google+, Pinterest, Facebook share icons which help your visitors to choose the most suitable network for them.

Different Placement Options of Social Share Icon

Social Share Icon provides you the ability to choose where to show share buttons – on different position of the page, post or home page content. With Social Share Icons, you have much more chances to attract a wide variety of your website visitors.Plugin also allows you to choose which social media icon to show for sharing .
sections.installation:
Install social media share icons plugin via wordpress dashboard :

  1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress.
  2. Search for plugin “Social Media Share Icons”.
  3. Click “Install”.
  4. After Installation click activate to start using the Social Media Share Icons on your website.
  • Go to Social Share Icons from Dashboard menu.
  • Enable Social Share Icons feature and select the icons postion, alignment ,theme , message etc.

Install social media share icon plugin via FTP

  1. Download the Social Media Share Icon plugin
  2. Unzip Social Media Share Icon plugin
  3. Copy the social-share-icon folder
  4. Open the ftp \wp-content\plugins\
  5. Paste the folder inside plug-ins folder
  6. Go to admin panel => open item \”Plugins\” => activate Social Share Icons
sections.faq:
Q: What does social media share plugin do?

A.Social share plugin provides the ability to allow anyone easily share website content from (page, post or home page) on major social media (Facebook, Twitter, googleplus, LinkedIn, Pinterest ) by the use of the latest APIs on your website!

Q: Will it effect my site’s speed?

A. No ,Social Media Share Icons we are using in this plugin on front end of your WordPress site are soo light weight you don’t need to worry about your site’s speed

Q: Do I need to design the social media icons again?

A. No , you won’t need to get any trouble regarding design and layout of the social media icons since we have provided inbuilt 15 beautiful social icon themes.You can choose any as per your requirement.

Q: Does every social media icon themes supports animations?
A. No, the free version themes not support animations, for this; you need to buy premium version of Social Share Icon Plugin.

Q: Can I put social media sharing icons on both (top & bottom) of page?
A. Yes you can put social media sharing icons on both (top & bottom) of page.

Q: Can I put social media share icons on both (top & bottom) of post?
A. Yes you can put social sharing icons on both (top & bottom) of post.

Q: Can I put social media sharing icons on both (top & bottom) of home page?
A. Yes you can put social sharing icons on both (top & bottom) of home page.

Q: If I like a social media share icons theme’s animation and I want to have that animation on another social share icons theme, can I get?
A. Yes, but for this, you have to contact us for this, because we have to change some functionality in our plugin; just for you ðŸ˜‰

Q: If I want to add some additional social media share network like digg or tumblr, can i do that?
A. Yes, but for this, you have to contact us for this, because we have to change some functionality in our plugin; just for you ðŸ˜‰

Q: Some of the sharing apps are not working. Why is that?
A. This issue arises if your website is not publicly hosted. Facebook for example looks for the URL to generate the webpage’s preview for sharing.

Q: I want to upgrade to the social media share icons premium plan but I don’t find the option. How can I upgrade?
A. Premium version of the social share icon plugin can be activated from the plugin itself. To activate the premium version, you’ll find a banner image on top from where you can buy premium version.

Q: For any other query/problem/request?
A. Please email us at wpsuperheroplugins@gmail.com. You can also submit your query from the Social plugin’s configuration page.

Q: Can you help me set up the plugin at my website?
A. Yes, we can help you with it. Just drop an email at wpsuperheroplugins@gmail.com
sections.changelog:
1.5 Bug fixes
2.0
Added custom message feature to display your custom messages above social icons

Fixed issue with social wide on tablets

Add description for alignment and positioning on admin page

1.5
Bug fixes

1.3
Optimize social icons for mobile & tablets.

1.2
Fixed styling conflict with themes.

1.0
Initial version.

If you think, that you found a bug in our social share plugin or have any question tell us via support forum .

Social Share Icons
